spells.name: Break Enchantment
spells.description: Frees subjects from enchantments, transmutations, and curses.

spells.name: Heal
spells.description: Cures 10 points/level damage, all diseases and mental conditions.

spells.name: Major Creation
spells.description: As minor creation, plus stone and metal.

spells.name: Raise Dead
spells.description: Restores life to subject who died as long as one day/level ago.

spells.name: True Seeing
spells.description: Lets you see all things as they really are.

spells.name: Wall of Stone
spells.description: Creates a stone wall that can be shaped.
